_sText:
hi, here is a quick map i did recently. as usual, i like to try new things. this time, it was back with small ramp style in a cave map theme with displacement. b2 is also a bhop (a bit of fly) bonus and b3 is a slide bonus. first time trying to map something different than surf, im not a bhop expert but i hope it's playable xd, enjoy

IMPORTANT: if you downloaded the map before the 29/08/17, redownload it as i fixed unconsistent drop zones. sorry for that

Map: tier 3-4 (depends on server), 4 stages, 4 bonuses. (seems like im fan of the 4/4/4 combo)

Download link (css): https://gamebanana.com/maps/196851
Download link (csgo): https://gamebanana.com/maps/196852

Showcase video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1a4gNFWSVvM

Special thanks to not_a_zombie for his helps as always and Tony Montana for the inspiration.

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).
